name: Dragon Token
description:
Dragon Token (DT) is the native asset of the DragonEx platform with dividend-sharing and investment/voting right attributes. 100% of DragonEx's transaction fee income will be shared with DT holders. Over 51million USDT has been distributed to DT holders to date. 1DT can reportedly receive up to 9.8USDT as dividends.  Asset subscription of the DragonEx Open Platform is open to DT holders only, DT is the only circulating currency in DragonLand developed by the Sandbox Game Neoworld. Each DT confers voting rights.


Launched in Nov 2017, DragonEx is a centralized cryptocurrency trading platform that is based in Thailand. DragonEx claims to have pioneered the transaction mining model, with a commitment to share 100% of trading commission with DT holders. The platform increases community participation by sharing revenue among community members. Since DT was launched, DragonEx has been sharing dividends with DT holders; USD 51M  has reportedly been distributed.
